name: Flicky Bee
description:
My Submission to Mini Jam 128 : Health
https://itch.io/jam/mini-jam-128-health

CURRENTLY CANNOT TEST THE BROWSER VERSION.

IT PROBABLY REQUIRES CHROME. SORRY.

Controls:

Click or Touch then Drag back to flick the bee from the flower.

Once the bee is in the air, Click or Touch then Drag in a direction to fly that direction.

I initially had a really  hard time coming up with an idea for the Theme and Limitation of "the only way to go is up", but here we are! I normally don't make music, so please endure my 3 note jam.

Made with:

  • Godot 4 (First time using verison 4)
  • LMMS
  • Krita
  • Audacity
